official-title.#text:
To direct the Secretary of Veterans Affairs to make certain improvements in the information
			 technology of the Veterans Benefits Administration of the Department of
			 Veterans Affairs to process claims more efficiently, and for other
			 purposes.

sponsor.#tail: introduced the following bill; which was referred to the

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text: Veterans Benefits Administration Information Technology Improvement Act of 2014
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Veterans Benefits Administration Information Technology Improvement Act of 2014

text.#text: This Act may be cited as the

header.#text:
Improvement of information technology of the Veterans Benefits Administration of the Department of
			 Veterans Affairs

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
shall, to the maximum extent possible, make such changes and
			 improvements to the information technology system of the

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text:
Veterans Benefits
			 Administration of the Department of Veterans Affairs

header.#text: Processing of certain educational assistance claims

text.#text:
to the maximum extent possible, all original and supplemental claims for educational assistance
			 under

rules-based processing is used to make decisions with respect to such claims with little human
			 intervention.

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
shall reduce redundancy and inefficiencies in the use of
			 information technology to process claims for rehabilitation programs under

text.#text:
ensuring that payments of subsistence allowance for veterans participating in a rehabilitation
			 program under such chapter are only processed and paid out of one
			 corporate information technology system, in order to eliminate the
			 redundancy of multiple information technology payment systems; and

enhancing the information technology system supporting veterans participating in such a program to
			 support more accurate accounting of services and outcomes for such
			 veterans.

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
a report on the changes made pursuant to
			 the requirements os

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Veterans Benefits Administration Information Technology Improvement Act of 2014/s:2/ss:a
Veterans Benefits Administration Information Technology Improvement Act of 2014/s:2/ss:b

text.#text: Not later than 180 days after the date of the enactment of this Act, the

{http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/}title.#text: 113 HR 4038 IH: Veterans Benefits Administration Information Technology Improvement Act of 2014

{http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/}rights.#text: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.
